Element.value: You are Thuynhan, a newly appointed Weber factory manager in China. As a part of your initial training, you have been invited to Les Miroirs in Paris, in order to attend a series of conferences and workshops led by Caroline Jones, Saint-Gobain’s Training Manager and Leader for the People Development WCM pillar. At the end of the day, you have the opportunity to meet with her in person as she is packing her training material back.

During the following conversation, you are going to ask Caroline to provide you with real-life examples illustrating the benefits of Training for the Group’s employees. You will have to: * Identify the Group’s WCM model’s main components for HR * Collect information about the MKT2 program.
